```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
m <- 1609
s <- 3600
m_s_to_mph <- function(m,s){
  (result <- ((m/1000)/(s/(3600))))
}
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

# Function to convert m/s to km/h
m_s_to_kmh <- function(distance, time_seconds) {
  speed_ms <- distance / time_seconds
  speed_kmh <- speed_ms * 3.6
  return(speed_kmh)
}

WR_speeds_m <- c(m_s_to_kmh(100,9.58), m_s_to_kmh(200,19.19), m_s_to_kmh(400,43.03),
                 m_s_to_kmh(800,100.91), m_s_to_kmh(1000,131.96), m_s_to_kmh(1500,206),
                 m_s_to_kmh(1609.344,223.13), m_s_to_kmh(5000,755.36), m_s_to_kmh(10000,1571),
                 m_s_to_kmh(21097.5,3402), m_s_to_kmh(21330,3600), m_s_to_kmh(42195,7235))

# Convert distances from meters to kilometers
distances_km <- c(100,200,400,800,1000,1500,1609.344,5000,10000,21097.5,21330,42195) / 1000

WR <- tibble(WR_speeds_m, distances_km)
WR <- WR %>% mutate(point_color = ifelse(distances_km == 42.195, "Marathon", "Other"))

ggplot(WR, aes(distances_km, WR_speeds_m, color = point_color)) + 
  geom_point(size = 1.1) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("Marathon" = "red", "Other" = "#1A1A1A")) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ I(log(x)), 
              color = "orange", linewidth = 0.75, se = TRUE, alpha = 0.2) + 
  ggtitle("Men's World Record Speeds by Distance",
          subtitle = "Current World Records") + 
  xlab("Distance (kilometers)") + 
  ylab("World Record Speed (km/h)") +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 18, hjust = 0.5, margin = margin(b = 5)),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 12, hjust = 0.5, color = "grey30", margin = margin(b = 15)),
    axis.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 13),
    axis.text = element_text(size = 11, color = "grey20"),
    panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "grey90", linewidth = 0.5),
    panel.grid.minor = element_line(color = "grey95", linewidth = 0.3),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "white", color = NA),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white", color = NA),
    legend.position = "none",
    plot.margin = margin(20, 20, 20, 20)
  )


ggsave("mens_world_records_current.png", 
       width = 10, 
       height = 7, 
       units = "in",
       dpi = 300)
```
